dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
dishes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
preparation_steps: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Pecorino Romano cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy, then remove from heat and drain excess fat.
Combine cooked spaghetti with the egg and cheese mixture, then add the crispy pancetta.
Toss everything together until the heat from the spaghetti cooks the eggs and creates a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately, garnished with extra Pecorino Romano cheese and black pepper.

dishes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
dishes.description: Quick and healthy stir-fry with chicken, vegetables, and a savory sauce.
preparation_steps: In a wok or large skillet, heat oil over high heat.
Add minced garlic and diced chicken. Stir-fry until chicken is cooked through and slightly browned.
Add sliced bell peppers and broccoli florets. Stir-fry for a few more minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour soy sauce over the stir-fry and toss to coat everything evenly.
Serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: Refreshing Italian salad with tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and balsamic glaze.
preparation_steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter, alternating them.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as an appetizer or side dish.

dishes.name: Beef Tacos
dishes.description: Tasty and spicy beef tacos with salsa, lettuce, and cheese in soft tortillas.
preparation_steps: In a skillet, brown the ground beef over medium-high heat, breaking it apart with a spoon.
Drain excess fat and add the taco seasoning. Cook according to the seasoning packet instructions.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Assemble tacos by placing beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa on each tortilla.
Fold in half and serve hot.

dishes.name: Mushroom Risotto
dishes.description: Creamy Italian risotto with mushrooms, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.
preparation_steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add chopped onion and garlic; sauté until translucent.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and brown slightly.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for a couple of minutes until the rice is translucent around the edges.
Pour in the white wine and cook until it is mostly absorbed by the rice.
Begin adding the heated chicken broth, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until each addition is absorbed before adding more.
Continue this process until the rice is creamy and cooked to your desired level of doneness (usually about 18-20 minutes).
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese, season with salt and pepper, and serve hot.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: Classic Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Caesar dressing, and Parmesan cheese.
preparation_steps: In a large salad bowl, toss chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing until evenly coated.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese on top.
Toss once more and serve immediately as a side or main dish.

dishes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
dishes.description: Healthy stir-fry with a variety of colorful vegetables in a savory sauce.
preparation_steps: In a wok or large skillet, heat oil over high heat.
Add minced garlic and ginger; stir-fry for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers. Stir-fry for a few minutes until they start to soften.
Add snow peas and soy sauce. Continue to stir-fry until all the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serve hot over cooked rice or noodles.

dishes.name: Homemade Pizza
dishes.description: Delicious homemade pizza with your choice of toppings and a crispy crust.
preparation_steps: Preheat your oven to the highest temperature it can go (usually around 500°F or 260°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust.
Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Add your choice of toppings, such as pepperoni slices, bell peppers, and mushrooms.
Transfer the pizza to a hot pizza stone or a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
Slice and serve hot.

dishes.name: Baked Salmon
dishes.description: Healthy and flavorful baked salmon with lemon, garlic, and herbs.
preparation_steps: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Season salmon with salt and black pepper.
In a small bowl, mix minced garlic, chopped fresh dill, and olive oil.
Brush the garlic and dill mixture over the salmon fillets.
Place lemon slices on top of each fillet.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the salmon flakes easily with a fork.
Serve hot, garnished with additional fresh dill.
